descriptionNullable:
> Since the dawn of history, Egypt has been the home to many civilizations, cultures and very famous landmarks and now you (and your ML models) can experience that huge mixture of history.

# Description
This dataset is a subset of the [Google Landmarks Dataset v2](https://github.com/cvdfoundation/google-landmark) containing only Egypt's landmarks.
To explore the data visually head to [GLDv2's website](https://storage.googleapis.com/gld-v2/web/index.html) and select Egypt on the map.

• The dataset consists of **5391**  Images of **279** of Egypt's landmarks. all the images are resized to **244x244pixels**.
• The images are not equally distributed on the classes (some classes have up to 200 images and others can only have a single image).

# Possible Tasks
- Use Transfer Learning to train a landmarks classifier

# Get Started
Check out [this notebook](https://www.kaggle.com/code/aymanmostafa11/exploring-data-transfer-learning-resnet101) for a quick start on reading, visualizing and fitting a pretrained model on this dataset.

# Acknowledgements
> If you make use of this dataset please credit [GLDv2](https://github.com/cvdfoundation/google-landmark)
> Cover image: [Midjourney](https://midjourney.com/home/)
title: Egypt Landmarks
subtitle: Explore Egypt's past and present
